metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010180 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: GNU gdb All versions is affected by: Buffer Overflow - Out of bound memoryaccess. The impact is: Deny of Service, Memory Disclosure, and PossibleCode Execution. The component is: The main gdb module. The attack vectoris: Open an ELF for debugging. The fixed version is: Not fixed yet.

criterions.comment: gdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
